column3:
Uin Nee's latest scheme is even fishier than usual.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Check the fish trap at the designated location.
Deliver the fish-filled trap to Uin Nee.
Tyr Beq tells me that the land called “Amh Araeng” is nothing like Il Mheg. It's a dry, hot place where hardly anything grows. No flowers, no rivers, no lakes!
Some of the children there have never even <Emphasis>seen</Emphasis> a fish before! Imagine that! And yes, I think we both know where this is going...
That's right! I want you to bring me a fish to show the children in the Garden of Dreams. A nice, pretty one with shiny scales!

Now, this level of preparedness may come as a surprise, but I've already had one of my underlings set a trap down in Deepwood Swim. Much easier than messing about with hooks and whatnot. All you have to do is go and see if we've caught anything!
So? What have you got for me?

Oh, yes. These are...rainbowy twinkle trout. That's what we'll call them. I have big plans for you, little ones! You won't be swimming in boring old water like all the other fish, you'll be soaring through the skies of Lyhe Mheg!
And if we catch some more of these, they can all fly together to make a giant fish-rainbow! Ha ha! It's no wonder everyone thinks I'm a genius!
